text:
*3Through the portal, a weak magic tugs you from the Citadel.
Your feet hover over the floor as it shakes violently.
Pipes and pistons crash down in a muffled racket...
^
*1You have a detached sense of peace, and a moment to ponder what has occurred.
^
*2You open your eyes. Standing in The Magician's Guild are a wizard and a bishop.
Their faces relax in relief...
Over the following days, you work with them in secrecy to prevent
the realms of hell from stepping foot in Hamlet again.
^
Hamlet begins its ascent toward its former glory. The guilds unite
under your banner to clear out the straggling monsters and rebuild the city.
^
The citizens beg you to take the court and crown you the new Baron. You vow
to keep the liches' power secret, and stop anyone from seeking that power again...
^
*1Power you know will always be waiting.
